00022 #include "dfsch/format.h"

00031 #define FLAG_COLON 1
00032 #define FLAG_AT    2
00033 
00034 static int read_num_arg(char**string){
00035   int neg = 0;
00036   int res = 0;
00037 
00038   if (**string == '-'){
00039     neg = 1;
00040     (*string)++;
00041   }else if (**string == '+'){
00042     (*string)++;
00043   }
00044 
00045  next:
00046   switch(**string){
00047   case '\0':
00048     dfsch_error("Incomplete format directive", NULL);
00049   case '0':
00050   case '1':
00051   case '2':
00052   case '3':
00053   case '4':
00054   case '5':
00055   case '6':
00056   case '7':
00057   case '8':
00058   case '9':
00059     res *= 10;
00060     res += **string - '0';
00061     (*string)++;
00062     goto next;
00063   }
00064 
00065   if (neg){
00066     return -res;
00067   } else {
00068     return res;
00069   }
00070 }
00071 
00072 #define ARG_MAX 16
00073 
00074 static char* format_a(int flags, int argc, int*argv, dfsch_object_t* obj){
00075   if (argc == 0){
00076     return dfsch_object_2_string(obj, 1000, 0);
00077   } else {
00078     return dfsch_object_2_string(obj, argv[0], 0);
00079   }
00080 }
00081 static char* format_s(int flags, int argc, int*argv, dfsch_object_t* obj){
00082   if (argc == 0){
00083     return dfsch_object_2_string(obj, 1000, 1);
00084   } else {
00085     return dfsch_object_2_string(obj, argv[0], 1);
00086   } 
00087 }
00088 static char* format_w(int flags, int argc, int*argv, dfsch_object_t* obj){
00089   return dfsch_object_2_string(obj, 1000, 1);
00090 }
00091 static char* format_y(int flags, int argc, int*argv, dfsch_object_t* obj){
00092   if (argc == 0){
00093     return dfsch_object_2_string(obj, 1000, 1);
00094   } else {
00095     return dfsch_object_2_string(obj, argv[0], 1);
00096   }
00097 }
00098 static char* format_r(int flags, int argc, int*argv, dfsch_object_t* obj){
00099   if (argc == 0){
00100     return dfsch_number_to_string(obj, 10);
00101   } else {
00102     return dfsch_number_to_string(obj, argv[0]);
00103   } 
00104 }

00106 typedef struct format_list_t {
00107   size_t cur_pos;
00108   dfsch_object_t* head;
00109   dfsch_object_t* cur;
00110 } format_list_t;
00111 
00112 static format_list_t* make_format_list(dfsch_object_t* list){
00113   format_list_t* l = GC_NEW(format_list_t);
00114 
00115   l->cur_pos = 0;
00116   l->head = list;
00117   l->cur = list;
00118 
00119   return l;
00120 }
00121 
00122 static dfsch_object_t* list_get(format_list_t* l){
00123   dfsch_object_t* ret;
00124   
00125   if (!l->cur){
00126     dfsch_error("No more arguments", NULL);
00127   }
00128 
00129   ret = dfsch_car(l->cur);
00130   l->cur = dfsch_cdr(l->cur);
00131   l->cur_pos++;
00132 
00133   return ret;
00134 }
00135 static dfsch_object_t* list_peek(format_list_t* l){
00136   dfsch_object_t* ret;
00137   
00138   if (!l->cur){
00139     dfsch_error("No more arguments", NULL);
00140   }
00141 
00142   ret = dfsch_car(l->cur);
00143   return ret;
00144 }
00145 static void list_skip(format_list_t* l, size_t count){
00146   while (l->cur){
00147     if (count == 0){
00148       return;
00149     }
00150     count--;
00151     l->cur = dfsch_cdr(l->cur);
00152     l->cur_pos++;
00153   }
00154   dfsch_error("No more arguments", NULL);
00155 }
00156 static void list_seek(format_list_t* l, size_t count){
00157   l->cur = l->head;
00158   l->cur_pos = 0;
00159   while (l->cur){
00160     if (count == 0){
00161       return;
00162     }
00163     count--;
00164     l->cur = dfsch_cdr(l->cur);
00165     l->cur_pos++;
00166   }
00167   dfsch_error("No more arguments", NULL);
00168 }
00169 static void list_backskip(format_list_t* l, size_t count){
00170   list_seek(l, l->cur_pos - count);
00171 }
00172 
00173 typedef struct format_stack_t format_stack_t;
00174 
00175 struct format_stack_t {
00176   format_list_t* args;
00177   char* start;
00178   char type;
00179   format_stack_t* next;
00180 };
00181 
00182 static format_stack_t* format_push(format_stack_t* prev, 
00183                                    char* start, char type,
00184                                    format_list_t* args){
00185   format_stack_t* state = GC_NEW(format_stack_t);
00186 
00187   state->next = prev;
00188   state->start = start;
00189   state->type = type;
00190   state->args = args;
00191 
00192   return state;
00193 }
00194 
00195 char* dfsch_format(char* string, 
00196                    dfsch_object_t* args){
00197   int argc;
00198   int argv[ARG_MAX];
00199   int neg;
00200   size_t l;
00201   str_list_t* out = sl_create(); 
00202   int flags;
00203   format_stack_t* state = format_push(NULL, 
00204                                       string, '\0', make_format_list(args));
00205 
00206   while (*string){
00207     if (*string == '~'){
00208       string++;
00209       flags = 0;
00210       argc = 0;
00211 
00212       if (!*string){
00213         dfsch_error("Incomplete format directive", NULL);
00214       }
00215 
00216       if (strchr("0123456789'\",", *string)){
00217         argc = 1;
00218         while(1) {
00219           switch (*string){
00220           case '0':
00221           case '1':
00222           case '2':
00223           case '3':
00224           case '4':
00225           case '5':
00226           case '6':
00227           case '7':
00228           case '8':
00229           case '9':
00230           case '-':
00231           case '+':
00232             argv[argc-1] = read_num_arg(&string);
00233             break;
00234           case ',':
00235             argv[argc-1] = -1;
00236             string++;
00237             break;
00238           default:
00239             argv[argc-1] = 0;          
00240             string++;
00241             break;
00242           }
00243           
00244           if (*string == ','){
00245             argc++;
00246             if (argc == ARG_MAX){
00247               dfsch_error("Too many arguments to format directive",
00248                           NULL);
00249             }
00250             string++;
00251             continue;
00252           } else {
00253             break;
00254           }
00255         }
00256         
00257       }
00258 
00259     flags:
00260       if (!*string){
00261         dfsch_error("Incomplete format directive", NULL);
00262       }
00263       if (*string == ':'){
00264         flags |= FLAG_COLON;
00265         string++;
00266         goto flags;
00267       }
00268       if (*string == '@'){
00269         flags |= FLAG_AT;
00270         string++;
00271         goto flags;
00272       }
00273       
00274       /* End of arguments and flags */
00275 
00276       switch(*string){
00277       case '\0':
00278         dfsch_error("Incomplete format directive", NULL);
00279       case 'a':
00280       case 'A':
00281         sl_append(out, format_a(flags, argc, argv, list_get(state->args)));
00282         break;
00283       case 's':
00284       case 'S':
00285         sl_append(out, format_s(flags, argc, argv, list_get(state->args)));
00286         break;
00287       case 'w':
00288       case 'W':
00289         sl_append(out, format_w(flags, argc, argv, list_get(state->args)));
00290         break;
00291       case 'y':
00292       case 'Y':
00293         sl_append(out, format_y(flags, argc, argv, list_get(state->args)));
00294         break;
00295       case 'r':
00296       case 'R':
00297         sl_append(out, format_r(flags, argc, argv, list_get(state->args)));
00298         break;
00299       case 'd':
00300       case 'D':
00301         sl_append(out, dfsch_number_to_string(list_get(state->args), 10));
00302         break;
00303       case 'x':
00304       case 'X':
00305         sl_append(out, dfsch_number_to_string(list_get(state->args), 16));
00306         break;
00307       case 'o':
00308       case 'O':
00309         sl_append(out, dfsch_number_to_string(list_get(state->args), 8));
00310         break;
00311       case 'b':
00312       case 'B':
00313         sl_append(out, dfsch_number_to_string(list_get(state->args), 2));
00314         break;
00315       case 'c':
00316       case 'C':
00317         sl_append(out, 
00318                   dfsch_char_encode(dfsch_number_to_long(list_get(state->args))));
00319         break;
00320       case 'f':
00321       case 'F':
00322         switch (argc){
00323         case 1:
00324           sl_append(out,
00325                     dfsch_saprintf("%*s", argv[0],
00326                                    dfsch_object_2_string(list_get(state->args), 
00327                                                    1000, 1)));
00328           break;
00329         case 2:
00330           sl_append(out, dfsch_number_format(list_get(state->args), 
00331                                              argv[0], argv[1]));
00332           break;
00333         default:
00334           dfsch_error("Wrong number of arguments to ~f", 
00335                       DFSCH_MAKE_FIXNUM(argc));          
00336         }
00337         break;
00338       case '?':
00339         {
00340           char* fmt = dfsch_string_to_cstr(list_get(state->args));
00341           sl_append(out, dfsch_format(fmt, list_get(state->args)));
00342         }
00343         break;
00344         
00345 
00346       case '*':
00347         if (argc == 0){
00348           argc = 1;
00349           if (flags == FLAG_AT){
00350             argv[0] = 0;
00351           } else {
00352             argv[0] = 1;
00353           }
00354         }
00355 
00356         switch (flags){
00357         case FLAG_COLON:
00358           list_backskip(state->args, argv[0]);
00359           break;
00360         case FLAG_AT:
00361           list_seek(state->args, argv[0]);
00362           break;
00363         default:
00364           list_skip(state->args, argv[0]);
00365         }
00366         break;
00367       case '~':
00368         sl_append(out, "~");
00369         break;
00370       case '%':
00371       case '&':
00372         sl_append(out, "\n");
00373         break;
00374       default:
00375         dfsch_error("Unknown format directive", NULL);
00376       }
00377       
00378       string++;
00379 
00380     } else {
00381       l = strcspn(string, "~");
00382       sl_nappend(out, string, l);
00383       string += l;
00384     }
00385   }
00386 
00387   return sl_value(out);
00388 }
00389 
00390 static dfsch_object_t* native_format(void *baton, 
00391                                      dfsch_object_t* args, 
00392                                      dfsch_tail_escape_t* esc){
00393   char* format;
00394   DFSCH_STRING_ARG(args, format);
00395 
00396   return dfsch_make_string_cstr(dfsch_format(format, args));
00397 }
00398 
00399 void dfsch__format_native_register(dfsch_object_t *ctx){
00400   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "format", 
00401                     dfsch_make_primitive(&native_format,NULL));  
00402 }
